General.Name: Hippo Holdings Inc
General.Description: Hippo Holdings Inc., together with its subsidiaries, provides property and casualty insurance products to individuals and business customers primarily in the United States. It operates three segments: Services, Insurance-as-a-Service, and Hippo Home Insurance Program. The company's insurance products include homeowners' insurance against risks of fire, wind, and theft, as well as other personal lines policies from third party carriers; personal and commercial; and auto, flood, earthquake, pet, and other insurance products. It also offers service contracts, home health check-ups, and home care advice. The company distributes insurance products and services through its technology platforms and website, as well as operates licensed insurance agencies. Hippo Holdings Inc. is headquartered in Palo Alto, California.
General.Address: 150 Forest Avenue, Palo Alto, CA, United States, 94301
